tool_description: Validates multi-currency transaction data for completeness, format, and business rules compliance.

payment_method.description: Payment method: card, bank_transfer, wallet, crypto

error_messages: Missing required field: All transaction fields (transaction_id, merchant_id, customer_id, amount, currency, payment_method, customer_country, merchant_country) must be provided.
Invalid amount: Transaction amount must be positive and within acceptable limits.
Invalid currency: Use valid ISO 4217 currency code.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [card, bank_transfer, wallet, crypto].
Invalid country code: Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.
Transaction ID format error: Transaction ID must be a non-empty string with valid characters.
usage: Provide all required transaction fields. The tool validates data format, business rules, and returns validation status with any errors found.

is_valid.description: Whether the transaction data is valid

validation_errors.description: List of validation error messages if any

risk_score.description: Calculated risk score for the transaction (0-100)
